posts.post_content:
Trying to slowly work on a complete back run...except for the couple REALLY rare ones that are likely out of my price zone. 

If anyone has some mower to mid grade Crawfords for sale, please shoot me a PM with asking price and also if you can send front and back scans to [url]sjohnson22@neb.rr.com[/url] that would be appreciated.


Looking for a few with bat back varieties and just about every throwing back variety.

If you have any other Crawford's you think I might be interested in, feel free to contact me as well.

Happy Collecting!

Dave
